name: VA DA
description:
VA DA is a trivial animation/drawing program.
It was created for Ludum Dare 35.

Control with mouse.

To start, click on the "plus" icon and then click in the blank area of the canvas.
(uh, if you're stuck on the title screen, click on the title.)

You may also experiment with the other icons, or click on the stereo for some phat beatz. If you want to.
